transcript:
Customer: Main aapko yahan pe yahi bolna chahta hun ki dono cheezein kammi hai. Pehle usko solve kar lete hain. Hello.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Kammi ki kammi ke bare mein kya cheezein hai? Hello.
Executive: Hello haan bataiye aap.
Customer: Sir bol rahe hain.
Executive: Haan sir main thoda sa busy hun. Haan haan bataiye aap.
Customer: Haan main JC Textile se bol raha hun. Meri sir se baat hui thi aapke.
Executive: Achcha sir.
Customer: Haan unhone bola tha HOB se baat karao aur kuch mere ko buylead nahi mil rahi thi iske.
Executive: Uh thoda sa sir paanch minute wait kar lijiye bas wo video meeting mein hai. Uh discussion bas end ho rahi hai fir wo aapko call back kar rahe hain.
Customer: Theek hai call back kara dena mere ko. Aap kahan se bol rahe hain ye bata dijiyega ek bari.
Executive: Main JC Textile, Byawar, Rajasthan se.
Customer: JC Textile.
Customer: Haan Byawar, Rajasthan.
Executive: Okay okay okay.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not getting buyleads.



Resolution:

- Executive informed that the concerned person is busy.
- Assured a call back after the meeting.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will receive a call back.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, call back, meeting
